p: AWF is identical for FF-NCE and FF-WCE throughout the simulation ( Fig 7A, Table 5). FAB for FF-NCE is very similar to that for FF-WCE during the early 20 th c. but is higher through the rest of the simulation with a peak difference of 1.08% of cell area during the late 21 st c. ( Fig 7B, Table 5). TAB for FF-NCE is similar to that for FF-WCE through the 20 th c., but is higher during the 21 st c. with a maximum difference of 0.28% during the late 21 st c. ( Fig 7C, Table 5).
